metadata.title: CVE-2023-1812 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in DOM Bindings in Google Chrome prior to112.0.5615.49 allowed a remote attacker to perform out of bounds memoryaccess via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
